metadata.title: CVE-2018-16086 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in extensions API in Google Chrome prior to69.0.3497.81 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to bypass navigation restrictions via a crafted ChromeExtension.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
